arabic: اَللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى مُحَمَّدٍ وَ آلِ مُحَمَّدٍ
اَللَّهُمَّ اجْعَلْنِيْ فِيْهِ مِنَ المُتَوَكِّلِينَ عَلَيْكَ
translation: In the Name of Allāh, the All-beneficent, the All-merciful.
O' Allāh send Your blessings on Muhammad and the family of Muhammad.
O Allah: on this day, (please] include me with those who rely upon You,
And include me on this day with those who win with You,
And include me on this day with those drawn near to You;
Out of Your beneficence; O the ultimate goal of the seekers.
transliteration: allāhumma ṣalli `alā muḥammadin wa āli muḥammad
